release.action: Changed code due to removal of "Type" as the default jaxbTypeClassesSuffix in XML schema generation. JAXB test class names are not suffixed with "Type" anymore.
The JAXB Cobol Annotator propagates the cobolComplexType annotation at the class level. This annotation keeps track of an associated POJO.

The JAXB Cobol Annotator now takes an external bindings file in order for all generated JAXB implementation classes to be serializable. This actually conflicts with XML Schemas generated with the previous version of schemagen. JAXB does not accept a globalbindings element both inside the Schema and within the external binding file. The globalbinding element needs to be removed manually from older XML schemas.
First version of the JAXB COBOL Annotator.
